description:
The Android OS Crash Course is a 10 chapter video guide plus 5 bonus content.

The course covers everything from the origins of Android to the best selling devices as well as the ins & outs of Android OS.

Here's a break down of what is covered in this crash course:

Module 1: What is Android?

This module focuses on “What is Android” as a whole. We cover the OS starting point and how it’s grown over the years in the smartphone & tablet market along with what makes it unique in the mobile OS market.

Module 2: Android vs iOS

Android vs iOS. The guide takes an in-depth look at what the pros/cons between Android and its main competitor iOS are. We look at where Android prevails & in some cases fails.

Module 3: Best Selling Android devices/Choosing your device

We look at the best selling Android devices on the market giving some recommendations on what to consider when purchasing a phone, tablet, or even smart watch. At the end you'll be given a list of the products we think are great alternative android devices.

Module 4: Google Play Store Overview

This chapters dives into an overview of the Google Play Store, Androids app market place and how you go about navigating it.

Module 5: Basic Android Features/Configuring your device

In this module we explore the basic features and functionalities of Android. Giving a video demo of the Android OS & how you can go about changing basic settings and features.

Module 6: Battery Saving Tips

This module is all about battery tips, making sure your device is optimally running & you’re doing the best to save time on your new android.

Module 7: Top 10 Android Apps

In this module we explore our top application picks going through what we view as essential apps for your phone or tablet. From general utilities to security apps. This will help you whether you’re buying a new device or just looking for apps to install on your current device.

Module 8: Transfer data onto Android (Syncing)

This module focuses on data transfer & how to go about importing/exporting content. This module is a great tool if you're switching from iOS to Android & want to know how to go about moving your data over. Also we focus on the importance of backing up your important data & how to store it in your google account or offsite in the event that your device is damaged or you lose any data.

Module 9: 9-Migrate from iOS to Android

This module covers iOS to Android migration more in-depth. Showing a direct demo & essential software to use when transferring data between the two platforms.

Module 10: Course Recap

This last module wraps up everything we've covered in the previous modules. A full look at Android as an OS & the ins and outs.

Bonus Module 11:

In this module we look at how to fully customize your Android experience as far as launchers, themes, etc goes. You'll be able to take advantage of the great personalization options offered in Google Play Store.

Bonus Module 12:

This module focuses on securing your device at a more detailed level. Android offers many antivirus, security features, and more packed into the OS. As far as pass codes & keeping your data secured. Learn how to protect your device both physically & software.

Bonus Module 13:

Here we get into more details regarding Android tablets including the factors to consider when purchasing a tablet from hardware to software.

Bonus Module 14:

In this module we delve into the smart watch category at a more detailed level. We take a look at the many popular android wear options available and the current evolving market that is smart watches.

The Android OS Crash Course will help you understand Android. Not just the actual hardware but also the software through demos & overviews. You will be guided step by step throughout each lesson with rich media including text, images, and video.

If you’ve ever wanted a crash course on Android as a new user or even experienced user you’re bound to get something from the guide. This course is also packed with information and recommendations about the best apps & hardware alike.

Join our Android OS Crash Course Now! See you on the inside!...
title: Android OS Crash Course for SmartPhone/Tablet
